ygData.subject: black
ygData.msgSnippet: Blackened armour is equal in AC to chain, which is inferior to banded (unless the patch just changed things).
ygData.messageBody:
Blackened armour is equal in AC to chain, which is inferior to banded
(unless the patch just changed things).



> ----------
> From: Dean Boyle[SMTP:gino_14@...]
